list.abs: ...消融碛消融碛（ablation moraine）是冰川消融后退时在冰川末端的堆积，多为冰碛块砾散布于冰川槽谷中，细粒物质已为冰融水冲走。国际上有的认.
射频消融(Radiofrequency Ablation) 在超声波或电脑断层扫描期间用幼针插进肿瘤，透过针传送无线电波，将肿瘤加热毁灭。
ablation moraine 消融碛ablation skin 熔蚀皮ablation till 消融碛
可以微波消融（Microwave ablation）或射频消融（Radio-frequency ablation）治疗。发表于 2012-04-25 17:02:48 提示：专家发表的 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the general sense 'taking away, removal'): from late Latin ablatio(n-), from Latin ablat- 'taken away', from ab- 'away' + lat- 'carried' (from the verb ferre)

means.word_mean: 1. surgical removal of a body part or tissue
2. the erosive process that reduces the size of glaciers
